alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:45PM EDT until May 27 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... North central Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 544 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lake City, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Gresham, Hyman, Hannah, Friendfield, Poston, Brittons Neck, Kingsburg, Scranton and Lake City Community Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
